data.descriptor: Appointment of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today viz. February 5 2026 has appointed Mr. Prabhat Singh (Membership No. F8724) as the Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the Company effective from February 5 2026. Consequent thereto he shall also be the Nodal Officer of the Company.

data.caption: Investment In The Solar Power Wheeling Project For The CompanyS Plants At Uttarakhand And Rajasthan Under The Group Captive Mechanism
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today viz. February 5 2026 has consider and approved the matter given in the attached file.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today viz. February 5 2026 has considered and approved additional investment of Rs. 275 crore (in one or more tranches through a combination of primary infusion and / or secondary purchase) in Euler Motors Private Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith a copy of the Press Release being issued by the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Dividend Updates
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today viz. February 5 2026 has considered and approved interim dividend @5500% i.e. Rs. 110 per equity share for the financial year 2025-26. Accordingly the Board has fixed February 11 2026 as record date for determining entitlement of members for the purpose of payment of interim dividend. The payment of interim dividend will be completed by March 7 2026

data.caption: Record Date Intimation- February 11 2026
data.news_body: The Board of Director at its meeting held today viz. February 5 2026 has considered and approved interim dividend @5500% i.e. Rs. 110 per equity share for the financial year 2025-26. Accordingly the Board has fixed February 11 2026 as record date for determining entitlement of members for the purpose of payment of interim dividend. The payment of interim dividend will be completed by March 7 2026.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today viz. February 5 2026 has considered and approved interim dividend @ 5500% i.e. Rs. 110 per equity share for the financial year 2025-26. Accordingly the Board has fixed February 11 2026 as record date for determining the entitlement of members for the purpose of payment of interim dividend. The payment of interim dividend will be completed by March 7 2026.

A copy of the said results along with the limited review report is enclosed. A press release issued in this regard is also enclosed.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body: Hero Motocorp Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 05/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve In continuation of our letter dated January 21 2026 wherein we informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled to be held on Thursday February 05 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31 2025. Pursuant to Regulation 29 and other applicable Regulations of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that in the said meeting the Board of Directors may also consider declaration of interim dividend if any for the financial year 2025-26.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body: We refer our earlier communication dated February 6 2025 wherein we informed you about the decision of the Companys Board of Directors to invest in a Solar Power Wheeling project for the Companys Dharuhera and Gurugram manufacturing plants under the captive scheme. In this regards we wish to inform you that the Company has completed the acquistion of 26%(Twenty Six percent) equity stake in Clean Max Karakoram Private Limited (Special Purpose Vehicle) from Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions Limited (formely known as Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions  Private Limited). Please refer to the intimation made by the Company in this regards.
